entry.title: Pack of 12 | 3D Gold Butterfly Wall Decals, DIY Removable Mural Stickers Butterfly Cake Decorations
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5150
Type: Decorations
Price: 2.99

[About]

Item Includes:

  • 12 Butterflies
  • 20 Glue Dots
    		•
    Material: Paper And Foil
    Color: Gold
    Style: Gold Butterfly Decoration
    Small Butterfly Size: 3"L x 2"W
    Medium Butterfly Size: 3.75"L x 2.5"W
    Large Butterfly Size: 4.6"L x 3.25"W
    Features: Removable, Multipurpose and Easy to Apply
    There are 3 different sizes with 4 Butterflies each size
    Comes with Glue Dots that can be used to stick Butterflies to Walls/Surfaces.
    Perfect for decorating your workspace, living room, bedroom or window displays.
    All sizes are approximate measurements.
    Due to different light settings, the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

     

    Additional Information:

    • The 3D Butterfly Stickers can be applied on all smooth surfaces, such as Walls, Doors, Closets, Plastic, Metal, Tiles, Fridges, Laptops, Cars etc.
    • Suited for Party Wedding Decor, Party Decorations, Home Decorations, living room, children's playroom, dining room.

Ideal for events such as Cinco de Mayo, Disco, Halloween, Hawaiian Luau, Hollywood Theme Parties
All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Easy To Install: Metallic Table Skirt come with Adhesive Backing located on Top Back Part of Skirt. Peel off the tape, attach to the edge of a round or rectangle table. Done.
  • Easy to clean: The party table skirt is disposable to avoid cleaning up, you can throw it away after use
  • Uses: Perfect for weddings, baby showers, birthdays, Bachelorette, classic candy buffets, dessert tables, prom, banquet, Thanksgiving, Christmas party and more

entry.title: 8ft Turquoise Metallic Foil Fringe Curtain - Doorway and Party Backdrop Curtain
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Backdrops
Price: 4.99 - 56.89 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Foil Fringe Curtain
Area Covered: 24 Sq Ft
Material: Metallic Foil
Color: Turquoise
Height: 8Ft
Width: 3Ft
Perfect for room divider, pair with backdrop stand
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Party Essential

    Use our glimmering metallic foil fringe curtains to make a jazzy splash on your upcoming special event. Fun, groovy, and always perfect for adding a bit of dramatic flair into any event, fringe curtains are a perfect addition to parties, performance stages, photo booths, funky backdrops, or simply for hanging by the doorway.

    Impeccable Texture

    Our high quality foil fringe curtains are a simple way to achieve a surreal level of decorative flair. Their impeccable sheen and glossy texture will not only add a sense of grandeur to any event but can also completely transform any space. From elite events to intimate weddings, their versatility cannot be denied. Use these as backdrops, ceiling decorations, and even for commercial trade show booths.

    Multipurpose

    For a seamless look, hang multiple panels side by side. You can use our gaudy fringe curtains in a doorway, in a window, or as a room divider. The length of these backdrop curtains for party can easily be adjusted by cutting to suit your desired embellishment. For a more stellar look, these curtains can also be used to create chandeliers, trade show booths, to highlight or to hide room features, and also to create event backdrops.

     

    Additional Information
    • Feature: Adhesive sticker on the back to apply on surfaces.
    • Uses: Wedding, Banquet Halls, Party, Restaurants, Photo Booth, Decoration
